Summary: Boomerang shape, brightly lit dark blue at center lightening to translucient at edges then dimming to a single bright red light.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fuquay-Varina
There were no other sightings in Fuquay-Varina on or around July 2nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile standing in a friends front yard I noticed movement and looked to see a single object darting above the trees. The object glowing blue would dart in all directions then hover motionless and slowly turn to a single bright red dot of light. From my experience in the army airborne I estimated the altitude to go between 1200 and 1800 ft very rapidly. The object would drift or decend at various speed below the tree tops. I have additional photos other than the ones I presented..notice the stars in the back ground..photos were taken with a hand held Dimyage E 500 Konica Minolta.
